metadata.name: Suspicious Start-Process PassThru
metadata.comment: Powershell use PassThru option to start in background

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('start-process')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-passthru ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-filepath ')))

output.summary: Powershell use PassThru option to start in background

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1036.003/T1036.003.md, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.management/Start-Process?view=powershell-5.1&viewFallbackFrom=powershell-7
